title: _TOGGLE_USE_PICKUPS_FOR_PLAYER
content:
0x616093EC6B139DD90x7FADB4B9// ToggleUsePickupsForPlayer
void _TOGGLE_USE_PICKUPS_FOR_PLAYER(Player player, Hash pickupHash, BOOL toggle);Parameters:player: Player ID. Use PLAYER_ID for your own player.pickupHash: Hash of the pickup, obtainable with GET_HASH_KEYtoggle: boolean that enables/disables the pickup drop (false to disable, true to enable)Disabling/enabling a player from getting pickups. From the scripts:
OBJECT::_616093EC6B139DD9(PLAYER::PLAYER_ID(), ${pickup_portable_package}, 0);
Examples:Lua-- Toggles the possibility for the player to drop the weapon pickups after death
local pickup = GetHashKey("PICKUP_WEAPON_ADVANCEDRIFLE")
ToggleUsePickupsForPlayer(PlayerId(), pickup, false)
codeBlocks:
// ToggleUsePickupsForPlayer
void _TOGGLE_USE_PICKUPS_FOR_PLAYER(Player player, Hash pickupHash, BOOL toggle);

Disabling/enabling a player from getting pickups. From the scripts:
OBJECT::_616093EC6B139DD9(PLAYER::PLAYER_ID(), ${pickup_portable_package}, 0);

-- Toggles the possibility for the player to drop the weapon pickups after death
local pickup = GetHashKey("PICKUP_WEAPON_ADVANCEDRIFLE")
ToggleUsePickupsForPlayer(PlayerId(), pickup, false)

local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for _TOGGLE_USE_PICKUPS_FOR_PLAYER
_ToggleUsePickupsForPlayer(player, GetHashKey('prop'), false)
